title: 02/16/2021 – Hour 2 – Draymond Speaks Out
itunes:title: 02/16/2021 – Hour 2 – Draymond Speaks Out
description:
Rob and TJ dive into Warriors PF Draymond Green’s comments last night about the way players that are likely to be moved are talked about in the media, Ryan Hollins joins the show to talk about Green’s comments and LeBron’s pursuit for the MVP award, and Urban Meyer has his welcome to the NFL moment after his ill-advised hiring of Chris Doyle.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
